main event: Observers reported sighting an object, described as being white in color, descending slowly at an elevation of 45-55 degrees, and traveling about 55 knots.
interesting points: The report contains important information, but details are lacking in some areas.
It is possible that weather/cloud conditions were responsible for the sighting.
There were attempts to determine if any nearby air force activities or balloon launches could have contributed to the sighting.
The lack of visual clues made it impossible to determine the location of any helicopters or local flight activity.
The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes.
